tag_list: grp, grpvc, venture-capital, david-lin, pricegrabber, montgomery, digital-media, online-advertising, fund-raising
overview:
Dave joined GRP Partners as an Associate in 2009. Prior to GRP, Dave was Director of Strategy and head of local and mobile search services at PriceGrabber.com, a leading provider of online comparison shopping services. Before PriceGrabber, Dave led the consumer software and services group as an investment banking associate at Montgomery & Co., where he advised both emerging growth and large cap technology companies on their mergers and acquisitions and capital raising strategies.

Dave earned his BA from UCLA.
